The image inscribed with the text: भारत रत्न अटल बिहारी जी के सम्मान में जय हिन्द लिख कर श्रद्धांजलि अर्पित करे” (Please express condolence in honor of Bharat Ratna Atal Bihari ji by typing Jai Hind- translated) has been shared more than 4300 times.
Alt News did a Google reverse image sear: Hon’ble CM condoles death of veteran scribe Bhupat Vadodaria” on the official website of Narendra Modi which had the same image attached to it.
The post from October 5: 2011, on the official website of Narendra Modi stated, “The chief minister also visited the residence of Vadodaria and paid his homage and consoled the bereaved family members.”
